message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $130 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $135 to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me there?
